channel.title: Compiling on [PI]/Plz ive asked this so many times!
channel.description:
Hi i am getting this error with any project insanity compiler. If i use a different compiler nothing changes after being compiled and when i looked at the [PI] compiler i knew why. It looks as though pi's compiler is designed to look for certain paths for folders going to be compiled. So now to buissness i get this [ The system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue]
This is the pi compiler i got with the dl [@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\java1.6.0_26\bin\javaw.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause] i have jdk installed and i have a 32 bit computer plz help!

item.title: Compiling on [PI]/Plz ive asked this so many times!
item.dc:creator: @gray561 gray561
item.description:
@gray561 wrote:

ok so i changed it to this code and still nothing

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src/server/gui/*.java pause

item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

Try changing the

Change the 26 into a 23

EDIT: If none of that works then try replacing it with

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src/server/gui/*.java pause

item.title: Compiling on [PI]/Plz ive asked this so many times!
item.dc:creator: @gray561 gray561
item.description:
@gray561 wrote:

Hi i am getting this error with any project insanity compiler. If i use a different compiler nothing changes after being compiled and when i looked at the [PI] compiler i knew why. It looks as though pi’s compiler is designed to look for certain paths for folders going to be compiled. So now to buissness i get this
[ The system cannot find the path specified
press any key to continue]

This is the pi compiler i got with the dl
[@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\java1.6.0_26\bin\javaw.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause]
i have jdk installed and i have a 32 bit computer plz help!
